author: Danny Crichton
title: Economists haven’t throw out the models yet (but they will)
description: There are many things that are in short supply these days, but one of them is cognitive flexibility. Humans are used to confronting the extreme complexity of our modern world with some mélange of data, modeling, heuristics, and “gut instinct.” We can’t know e…
content:
There are many things that are in short supply these days, but one of them is cognitive flexibility.
Humans are used to confronting the extreme complexity of our modern world with some mélange of data, modeling, heuristics, and gut instinct. We cant know eve… [+7376 chars]
